text: @galantichristi1 @CityofHoboken @RaviBhalla There were 84 cases last week with the revisions from backlog (week ending 4/25) — average of 12/day.  Great progress, but more cases than the last week of March.  It’s a good idea to keep slowing it down before loosening restrictions.
